result.html: Inniu Dé LuainToday is Monday.
result.ponchtml: Inniu Dé LuainToday is Monday.

result.eng: Monday is the worst day of the week.
result.ga: Is é an Luan an lá is measa den tseachtain
result.orig: Is é an Luan an lá is measa den tseachtain

result.ponchtml: Is é an Luan an lá is measa den tseaċtainMonday is the worst day of the week.

result.eng: I usually stay in Monday night, watching TV.
result.ga: Fanaim istigh oíche Luain de ghnáth ag amharc ar an teilifís
